channel.title: Stuck with Damon Young
channel.description: Award-winning author Damon Young is joined by the brightest and Blackest writers, comedians, and critics he knows to explore the hilarious and hideous absurdity of our behavior – and how race, gender, and class converge to make everything messy AF.Stuck with Damon Young is a Spotify Original Podcast from Gimlet and Crooked Media. New episodes drop every Tuesday.

item.title: Stuck on All the Shiny Sh*t I Want to Buy
item.description: Damon unpacks the whiplash of new money with Samantha Irby and Mehrsa Baradaran. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Stuck on the Pew (Cause I Fell Asleep)
item.description: Damon explores his (unconvincing) performance of Christianity with Roy Wood Jr. and Dr. Brittney Cooper. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Stuck on Blacking While Black
item.description: Damon examines the idea of performing Blackness around other Black people with Lauren Michele Jackson and Terence Nance. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Stuck on Whooping Some Ass (in My Head)
item.description: Damon explains why he wants all the smoke – specifically, why he needs to know if he’s capable of smoke – with Darnell Moore and Hannah Giorgis. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Stuck on “One Minute Man”
item.description: Damon is joined by Saida Grundy and Jason Reynolds to deconstruct all the weird, awkward and terrifying intraracial anxieties we have about cis-hetero sex. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Stuck on Sh*t My Dad Did
item.description: Damon talks to Nikole Hannah-Jones (and then his real actual dad) about all of the racial and economic factors impacting where he decides to send his kids to school. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

item.title: Welcome to Stuck
item.description: Award-winning author Damon Young is joined by the brightest and Blackest writers, comedians, and critics he knows to explore the hilarious and hideous absurdity of our behavior – and how race, gender, and class converge to make everything messy AF.Stuck with Damon Young is a Spotify Original Podcast from Gimlet and Crooked Media. New episodes drop every Tuesday. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
